post.body: Macys. I ratted to counterloser's floor boss.
DONE at the mall. Counter girl argued with me about price. So I skeedaddled but not before ratting. No tolerance for rudeness.
I'm sorry, did you say something? I passed out in a diabetic coma there for a second. Too much zweetness.
Not by a longshot. My better half is WAY better looking. She tolerates my codlike looks.
Are you writing haiku?
I aspire to be the best looking man in all of Nova Scotia, where I think my only competition are cod.
That's a beautiful accessory.
I could write a similar story about Tito Puente, who I was too starstruck to tap on the shoulder and talk to.
I don't think I've ever heard of anyone aspring toward ass pertness. I'm going to try to use the word pert more from now on.
I'm off the the mall to get my "babe" a gift that doesn't suck.
Feliz Navidad, my friends.
Heading to Greenstreets to go meet my girlfriend for a drink.
I spoke too soon about Pocketmac. Should call it Pocketcrap.
Interesting article in the wake of the Madoff scandal. http://bit.ly/fdNW How do my friends weigh in on this?
Finally got stupid Pocketmac to work on my Blackberry. These instructions saved me http://bit.ly/ruch
The halls of my office smell so...Christmasy. Why can't they smell like that all the time?
RT @NASA: Check out NASA's 40th Anniversary Celebration of Apollo 8 on the Web at http://tinyurl.com/83paku
RT @guykawasaki: 'Proto-spiders' made silk, but not webs http://ow.ly/1ty . Very cool. Spiders are my favorite arachnid.
Sometimes I feel that my life would be simpler if I opened up a tavern and served good food, spirits and listen to people tell their stories
RT @Ihnatko: Mark Evanier's Mel Torm√© story: http://www.povonline.com/cols/COL245.htm
